projects.title: EcoSort â€“ Intelligent Waste Management
projects.description: AI-powered waste sorting robot integrating computer vision, cloud connectivity, and robotic automation. Built using Raspberry Pi, YOLO, Django, and React for autonomous classification and remote monitoring.

projects.title: Smart Access System for Buildings
projects.description: RFID-enabled smart lock system using ESP32 and ESP-NOW for secure wireless access. Web dashboard developed with Django and React to manage users and log access events.

projects.title: Smart Irrigation System
projects.description: Automated irrigation system with remote control, OLED display, and overwatering prevention. Controlled via Arduino IoT Cloud and monitored through a mobile dashboard.
